resources.string:
Intown v1.0 

This application is developed for the purpose of helping people to buy and sell their old goods.
 What can you do here
 1. Sell/buy electrical appliances such as mobile,tv or fridge
 2. Sell/buy books and study materials.
 3. Get a place to live. buy or rent.
 4. Get your place rented.
 5. Sell/or buy old bike/car.
 6. Promote your store by listing it under respective category.
 7. Buy/sell furniture (new/old).
 And many more. If you find a category not listed, please inform, it will be updated ASAP.
 Feedback are welcome.
 mail at- ssaikia3@gmail.com
